data.name: Get In The Car, Loser! - Battle on the Big Boardwalk
data.detailed_description:
Battle on the Big Boardwalk

Sam and friends take a well-deserved break from fighting evil to unwind at the beach, only to have the Sword of Fate taken by a trouble-making interdimensional sword thief. Playable at any point after act 2 either during or after the main story, this is no filler episode—there's no time to waste staring at open toe sandals and exposed cleavage when the fate of the world is on the line!


  • Unlockable sexy beach outfits for each character to wear in and out of battle, even in the main game!
  • 15 endgame items, each with all new abilities that were too weird, specialized, or technical to make it into the main game. No matter what rank you're at, they'll always complement your current loadout without being overpowered... unless you find the right combinations, of course.
  • An all new legendary sword with the ability to banish a single enemy to the Shadow Realm per fight, allowing for different strategies than the Sword of Fate gives.
  • A full length story chapter with shenanigans on the beach, including a boss fight with our toughest enemies yet.

data.short_description: Take a break from adventure and relax on the beach in BATTLE ON THE BIG BOARDWALK — an all new story chapter featuring 15 new endgame items, an all new sword to rival the Sword of Fate, our hardest boss yet, and most importantly... beach outfits for everyone you can use at any time.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X El Capitan 10.11 or later
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000 or better
